title: New: Little Deed – NEON
content:
For a song titled NEON, Sydney’s Little Deeds debut (somewhat of a relaunch in truth) track is rather more subdued than you’d expect; that’s not to say it’s not hugely impressive.

Elements of London Grammar’s Hannah Reid or Florence Welch drift in and out, yet there’s far more to Little Deed than simply a great voice, this is some dauntingly good songwriting. Building to a gloriously over the top crescendo, it’s safe to say that Little Deed has made on hell of an impression. Check out NEON below (via).
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
